experience.title: Security Architect | Team Member | Fresher Level
experience.description: Joined NAB through the Batch 6 Cyber Security Internship and transitioned into a Security Architect role (entry-level). I work with project teams to identify and address security concerns, perform risk assessments across NAB’s infrastructure & SaaS Solution
achievements: [Internship] Gained foundational exposure to Security GRC, DLP, Offensive Security, and Mainframe security domains
[Internship] Assisted in applying Defense-in-Depth, Least Privilege, and Zero Trust principles to junior-level assignments
[Team Member] Performing Information Security Risk Assessment to ensure all projects compliant with NAB’s Security Policies, Procedures and Operational Guidelines
[Team Member] Supported security due diligence aligned with ISO 27001, NIST CSF v2, APRA CPS 234, and PCI-DSS standards
[Team Member] Assisted in reviewing security architectures for on-premises, hybrid-cloud, and multi-cloud (AWS, Azure) under guidance

experience.title: Technical Support Engineer
experience.description: Supported Microsoft System Center Suite and managed large-scale IT environments with focus on Windows Server infrastructure and cloud operations.
achievements: Supported Microsoft System Center Suite (Orchestrator, Configuration Manager, Operations Manager) for large-scale IT environments
Deployed and maintained Windows Server 2016, domain-connected PCs, and Kerberos V5 authentication
Streamlined data handling using SQL Server/SSRS for reporting and ETL processes
Administered on-prem Active Directory (Windows/Linux) and leveraged Azure (VMs, SCOM) with PowerShell

experience.title: Software Engineering Intern
experience.description: Developed Windows applications and backend systems for hotel management solutions using modern technologies and frameworks.
achievements: Developed a Windows application emulating hotel check-in (C#, .NET 6.0, MVVM) using internal APIs and tested with Postman
Enhanced a UWP kiosk app (monthly updates) with .NET 4.7.2 to improve hotel management features
Built a backend for a mini-PMS with NestJS and MongoDB, streamlining business logic and data handling
Collaborated with development team to deliver high-quality software solutions

education.description: As an RMIT Vietnam Bachelor of Information Technology student, I studied technical knowledge in system administration, software engineering, database design, and networking. Moreover,   I enhanced my technical soft-skill abilities by analyzing complex requirements, creating practical solutions, and improving them on my capstone and course projects.    Through technical events participation, I improved my skills in time management, task planning, and presenting technical concepts to classmates and professors. This is where I learnt to be more adaptive, obtained new resources, and become more confident in real-world situations.
